title: Bug 106425Percent value doesn't workproperly in height property of image and chart items
OB: Bug 106425Percent value doesn't workproperly in height property of image and chart items Description:Percent value doesn't work properly in height property of image and chart itemsSteps to reproduce:1.Insert a chart2.Set it's width to 100% and height to 100%3.In Chart Builder,modify some attributes and click OK4.Insert a image5.Set it's width to 100%Expected result:It work normal.Actual result:Chart item's width and height changed back to default values.Image shrink to a small size in layout viewer.
